omarwkh.bibinserter

Class BibShortcutGUIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • omarwkh.bibinserter.BibShortcutGUIManager

  • public class BibShortcutGUIManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages shortcuts that don't belong to GUI components. Manages showGUI() and hideGUI()
